snippet: V-Moda, a headphone maker, is usually concerned with putting sound into your ears, but its Faders VIP earplugs are intended to keep sound out.
abstract: V-Moda, a headphone maker, is usually concerned with putting sound into your ears, but its Faders VIP earplugs are intended to keep sound out.

headline.print_headline: Headphones for Good Sound or Convenience, but Not Both
